# Libraries

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ROSE)
```

# Upload data

```{r}
amazon.south <- data.table::fread("~/Documents/csv/amazon_south.csv", sep=";")

amazon.south <- amazon.south[, Year := as.factor(Year)]
amazon.south <- amazon.south[, Month := as.factor(Month)]
amazon.south <- amazon.south[, burntArea := as.factor(burntArea)]
amazon.south <- amazon.south[, landCover := as.factor(landCover)]

head(amazon.south)
```

# Split data

```{r}
amaz.train.dt <- amazon.south[amazon.south$Year %in% c(2001:2015), ]
amaz.test.dt <- amazon.south[amazon.south$Year %in% c(2016:2020), ]
```

```{r}
data.rose <- ROSE(burntArea ~ ., data = amaz.train.dt, seed = 1)$data
head(data.rose)
```

```{r}
save(data.rose, file = "~/Documents/R_data/amazon_df_rose.Rdata")
```
